caption.title: Distributions of strains in Monte-Carlo simulation.
caption.p:
The horizontal axis is the proportion of global infection of strains and the vertical axis denotes their global densities. Blue represents p
CC = 0.25, red represents p
CC = 0.4. Other parameters are x
C = 0.5, α = 1, β
G = β
L = 10.
Click here for additional data file.
